alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Highland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:57AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL BROWN, NORTHWESTERN ADAMS AND HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 630 AM EDT... At 556 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Hillsboro, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Peebles, Lynchburg, Winchester, Marshall, Sardinia, Seaman, Belfast, Rocky Fork Point, Highland Holiday, Russell, New Market, Emerald, Mowrystown, Cherry Fork, Sinking Spring, May Hill, Locust Grove, and Fincastle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
